# Government Tender Announcement
## W3555-249739 - Caterpillar Engine Parts
### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4044946849-Doc4085704843
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4044946849
* **Publication Date**: July 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 27, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Amendment Date**: July 19, 2023

### Description

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for the procurement of Caterpillar engine parts.

### Scope of Work

* Procurement of Caterpillar engine parts
* Delivery of parts to the Department of National Defence (DND) in British Columbia, Canada
* Tendering process will be conducted in accordance with the Treasurer's regulations
* Lowest price submission will be the basis for selection

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Other trade agreements may apply

### Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

* Christine Cress, Contracting Officer
* Email: [christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
